page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Types of employment include a large supermarket chain store and 7 local shopping areas, 2 in Ferring. Most of these include privately owned shops, banks and post offices. There are soft fruit farms, nurseries and farm shops. The climate is very good for fruit growing. An {employment survey}of parents occupations conducted by 3rd year pupils of West Park Middle School revealed this information: MALE FEMALE Full time employment 279 62 Part time employment 8 175 Unemployed 8 1 TOTAL 300 350
170 males work in the local area. 511 people are between 31 and 50 years of age
